nodes.text: Crimson Stormtroopers were elite stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire that were specially trained to operate in the heat of volcanic areas. They wore a variation of standard stormtrooper armor that was colored in crimson red, and allowed them to stay cool in battle. The troopers were equipped with an E-11 blaster rifle, which they could holster, or a DLT-20A blaster rifle.
